remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
sbc2iegf.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
sbc2iegf.2 $e |- F/ y ps $.
sbc2iegf.3 $e |- F/ x B e. W $.
sbc2iegf.4 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbc2iegf $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( [. A / x ]. [. B / y ]. ph <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d V x $.
$d W y $.
